definition: to sell/to offer for sale/to put on the market

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 當地的商店已經開始出售法國棍式麪包和比利時啤酒。

sentences.english: Google can shut down its phone manufacturing operations, or sell it off.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌可以關停手機生產部門，或是再次將其出售。

sentences.english: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 該公司在加利福尼亞和俄勒岡州出售西瓜汁。

sentences.english: For example, an electronic book for $30 could be sold to your prospects.
sentences.chinese: 例如，電子書籍可以出售給你30元的前景。

sentences.english: What happens in disputes between direct buyer and seller?
sentences.chinese: 直接購買者與出售者之間發生哪些爭端？

sentences.english: Friends of the museum were permitted to buy pieces that were de-accessioned.
sentences.chinese: 館友們也被容許購買博物館出售的館藏。

sentences.english: The only difference is that government's shares would be nonvoting until the government sold the shares at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的區別就在於政府在出售股票之前不具有表決權。

sentences.english: Among the horses on sale he saw his own horse.
sentences.chinese: 在出售的馬羣中，他發現了自己的那匹馬。

sentences.english: There's a discount for these sample copies.
He was led to the exclusive counter by the staff of the shop.
sentences.chinese: 他被商店的職員領到了專門出售高檔商品的櫃檯。

sentences.english: Nothing gets vultures squawking louder with delight than a wave of forced selling.
sentences.chinese: 只有被迫出售才能是這些禿鷲發出愉快的叫聲。

sentences.english: The sale of alcoholic beverages is restricted to those over 21.
sentences.chinese: 酒精飲料只能出售給21歲以上的成年人。

sentences.english: The other side is also for sale.
sentences.chinese: 另一半連體房也一併出售。

sentences.english: The group urges schools to stop selling full-calorie soft drinks.
sentences.chinese: 協會還敦促學校停止出售富含熱量的軟飲料。

sentences.english: That fast food business have expanded through the sale of franchise .
sentences.chinese: 該快餐店通過出售聯營經銷權而擴大了生意。

sentences.english: Because myself must immigrate Hong Kong, decides the American Armor Shop sell.
sentences.chinese: 因本人要移民香港，決定把美甲店出售。

definition: to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to mark down (the price of goods)/to sell off cheap
to pass on/to resell/to change hands
